name: Haverty Furniture Companies, Inc.
description: Haverty Furniture Companies, Inc. is a leading retailer of residential furniture and accessories in the United States. Founded in 1885 by Amos Haverty and his partner, the company has built a strong reputation for quality craftsmanship and exceptional customer service over the decades. Havertys operates over 100 showrooms across the southern and eastern United States, offering a wide range of furniture products, including bedroom, dining room, and living room furnishings, as well as home décor items. The company is committed to providing customers with stylish, high-quality furniture that suits diverse tastes and budgets. With a focus on sustainability, Havertys also emphasizes environmentally responsible sourcing and manufacturing practices. The company’s mission is to create a memorable shopping experience for its customers while ensuring they find the perfect pieces to enhance their homes. In addition to its retail operations, Havertys has a strong online presence, allowing customers to browse and purchase products conveniently from home. With a history of innovation and adaptation to changing market conditions, Havertys continues to be a trusted name in the furniture industry.
